website_summaries.verdict: If you know a Barbie fan who wishes she was able to ride a bike, kick a ball, or perform Yoga like a pro, this doll is everything they had hoped for and more.
pros: Barbie sports 22 joints and is extremely articulated
Easy to set Barbie in realistic poses or to move as an action figure

customer_reviews.title: cheaper look; less quality?
customer_reviews.text: To the left: the first version. To the right: latest version. I am really disappointed. At the very beginning I was very happy about the variety of skin tones. Now the made-to-move-dolls got almost the same skin color. Plus: The quality of the facial painting fades. Have a look... The doll to the right is not what I wanted. :-( I used to buy a lot. But picture and doll delivered are no longer of same outlook. Shame. I have stoped buying them now.
customer_reviews.author: Quatermain

customer_reviews.title: You can see the doll's scalp from every angle!
customer_reviews.text: Darn it she's doesn't have a lot of hair. Her hairdresser did a great job, considering what they had to deal with. By the way it would't hurt to have some wavy strands, why is this a privilege only brunettes have? It looks like all blond dolls of this line have the same issue, others have mentioned it as well. I've noticed that brown and black haired dolls have thicker rooting. I guess I will have to throw away her head, I am not a fan of her tiny lips either. So far the blue top brown hair is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: M_Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best dolls ever made!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with the made to move Barbie's, this one is wearing the gymnastics shirt from the gymnastics coach set, she wanted a coach who could move more, these barbies are the best dolls and toys made for little girls, they are more then just a doll, they are a doll that actually can do things that doesn't get tossed in the bottom of the toy box, my daughter almost has every one and we are hoping and praying they make more and more! After playing with a made to move the other dolls seem pretty boring to her, if you want a doll that actually gets played with, get a made to move, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Barbie's hair defective
customer_reviews.text: This barbie was supposed to be new, and when I opened the package, the doll's hair appeared to be "chopped" off unevenly in some places, not a professional cut at all (the doll is supposed to be long haired anyway) not at all like the usual hair on Barbies. It looks like the doll's hair was chopped off by some one. I would like it exchanged for the same doll, but with normal Barbie hair.
customer_reviews.author: josune

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Barbie so many have been waiting for! Full articulation! She bends at the: Neck, Torso, Hips, Knees, Ankles, Shoulders, Elbows & Wrists Whether it be riding a horse, a bike, driving a car or simply sitting on her bed: not only does she now look more natural in position but she is MUCH easier to get in to position. The joints are tight and firm and stay in place even with accessories in hand. If your Barbie is an active Barbie then this is the Barbie she needs to be!
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this Barbie!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved chore money to purchase this Barbie and couldn’t be happier!! Barbie bends and flexes into so many positions that she is much easier to play with! My daughter was always annoyed that her mommy Barbie couldn’t hold her babies without dropping them and couldn’t sit on her knees to play. Made to Move Barbie solved all of those issues and goes everywhere with us. I highly recommend this doll! 💖
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Cheap head knobs...
customer_reviews.text: First one I bought (a first or second wave Teresa) was fine, thick, sturdy, black head knob when taking it off. These newer second-third wave Pink Top/Barbie MTM dolls have cheap, thin, orange head knobs. So be incredibly careful when doing headswaps... Pink top's hair is incredibly thin, too. Another thing to add... This most recent wave's Pink Top doll had a different face from the original wave... The original one had a subtle, sweet look. This new one is just... Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Bellvue

customer_reviews.title: Versatile mini photo model .
customer_reviews.text: I own several Barbies , as photography is my budding hobby . Of the Barbies I own ,three being MTM ,this one is , by far the best . Her articulated versatility surpassed that of her movable sisters . Also her face ,shape of her head , hair part and skin tone is wonderful . She has become my favorite “mini model” in less than three days . High praise, to be sure . I recommend to other adult “fans “ as well as gift buying grandmas , moms or ,traditional customers . Mattel ,keep up the good work .
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed. I get that things happen in shipping but this is just ridiculous. If I can figure out how to attach photos I will. I'm not gifting this like planned, I'm going to just give it to her now. Wrapping it in this packaging would mean horrible gift wrapping. And it's not just the package but her hair, inside the package, is all messed up. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: DaughteroftheMostHigh

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: Can take almost any pose. I ollect vintage Barbie but I also have modern dolls fkr travel doll pics. I'm happy to have a doll that can take so many realistic poses in photos. Adds a lot of interest.it takes a bit of practice to figure out how her articulation works but once you work with her you'll love her
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barbie Dolls are the Bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I am not the only Grammy who has spent a lot of time helping to dress Barbie Dolls. One of the big perks of this Barbie Doll was the bendable parts that make it easier for little granddaughters to dress "mostly" on their own! Good value. Quite happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Lost in LA
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this doll, but she got lost in LAX on the way back home after recieving her week earlier. She cried for about an hour in sadness. She didn't pitch a fit, but I could tell this doll was amazing by how much time she played and the absence she felt of not having her.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to write this review so more people would have a chance to buy this Barbie for Christmas. I gave this to my great-niece (age 5) yesterday at our family’s Christmas exchange . It was an immediate hit! She loved Batbie’s moveable arms and legs, and played with this toy more than any other she received. I don’t know about durability, but my great-niece will love it while it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dolls
customer_reviews.text: I really like this doll. She is beautiful and her hair seem so much nicer than the other barbie. Its great that you can pose them. My youngest granddaughter loves playing with her and my oldest granddaughter love posing the doll in different position for photo shoots.
customer_reviews.author: L. Duci

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but...it is NOT what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: it is different from the picture like someone's review. the skin color is dark. I don't like her face. and every time I touch her hair, it falls out. so, I am afraid to touch her. I want a doll like the picture. I was deceived. I am upset.
customer_reviews.author: Eunju C.

customer_reviews.title: This one star is for the condition of the package ...
customer_reviews.text: This one star is for the condition of the package the barbie was in. I bought this as a gift for someone. The back of the barbie package was completely off (making it look used) and there was a huge tear the front of the box.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Her New Favorite is "Made To Move Barbie."
customer_reviews.text: The "Made to Move" Barbie is her newest favorite Barbie my granddaughter said! It is fun because her hands, feet, legs & arms are moveable making it more realistic to a child. However, they aren't easy to find in a physical store in my area. Amazon has several, though. I think any child would love this Barbie & makes for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Fuselier

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as I remember. But cute!
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because this barbie seems a tad cheap to me. Her hair is 4 different lengths with a big chunk that's about an inch longer than the rest. Her clothes seem cheaply made too. Maybe I'm just remembering barbies in a better light than they actually were. But the joints are great and she is super easy to pose! Shes really cute and I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff&Cierra A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Range of Movement
customer_reviews.text: Why can't all Barbies be this articulated? The body is comparable to the Liv dolls, with an extra joint in the elbows and in the knees. This creates greater range of movement. I even bought an extra to switch bodies with a non-articulated Barbie Fashionista doll. Don't pay scalper prices, though. This doll retails for $14.99.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Red Lox

customer_reviews.title: Opened Package
customer_reviews.text: I received a product that had been previously opened. This was going to be a gift, but an opened package is not suitable. The product itself is okay. I like the fully articulated joints. One thing to note is that the proportions on the feet are all wrong. The hands are larger than the tiny feet.
customer_reviews.author: dectech

customer_reviews.title: Pink top skin tone is orange now
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world did Mattel change the skin tones??? I bought 2 pink top thinking I’d be getting the paler skin tone again and I got orange! Why is barbie orange now????? Very disappointed and mad I wasted money on 2 dolls that don’t match any other head except the standard “Barbie” face mold.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love heeer!!
customer_reviews.text: She is BEAUTIFUL! So Barbie! Very soft blonde hair, gorgeous natural makeup, wonderful features. 100% Articulated on my opinion. I really would like to collect them all!
customer_reviews.author: JReyes

customer_reviews.title: Made to Move Barbie Dolls are the greatest!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the different poses that are achievable with these dolls. To me the joints look kind of weird if the doll is wearing shorts or short clothing, but I guess that I just notice stuff like that more than normal people.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly L. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Came in beat up box, missing plastic piece that covers barbie from damage.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so angry. I purchased this for Christmas and it arrived quickly. HOWEVER, the box is missing the plastic enclosure over the barbie and the box is beat up! I wouldn't be so mad if Christmas wasn't 13 days away and I had time to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Alr610

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Barbie doll
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a fun gift for my daughter because she's into barbie dall have to say she loves it. Very flexible compared to some of the other ones that's why she likes it
customer_reviews.author: Bert81

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite Barbie out of all the ones she has
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's favorite Barbie out of all the ones she has. Got it for her birthday and she still plays with it frequently. She likes to design dresses for her dolls too, and uses this one as the model since she can move her around as needed to adjust things.
customer_reviews.author: S Reichelt

customer_reviews.title: My Niece Loves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece and she loves this doll! She plays soccer and loves "doing" yoga with her mom, so this doll was a total hit. She also loves horses and has a few in her Barbie set, so this doll is also perfect for riding on the horses. All around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KEE24

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My daughter had been asking for her since she seen a YouTuber playing with her. We looked everywhere and only found her on Amazon. My daughter just loves her.
customer_reviews.author: Kvanscyoc

customer_reviews.title: For a “flexible” Barbie she doesn’t do splits
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old daughter wanted this and loves it Except that this made to move Barbie doesn’t do splits. She says her kid Barbies can and figured this made to move one would for sure but doesn’t so her and her friends are disappointed but still love it of course..it’s a Barbie!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Cute Doll!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute doll and well made! Love the way you can pose her. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dawny Girl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Seems to be holding up well so far, the joints are still tight and don't show any signs of coming loose which I expected to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new received used.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and paid for a new doll as a gift. Received a clearly used doll in previously opened, old crushed box with ratty hair. Seriously folks. Cute doll just not gift-able. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: DebiQ

customer_reviews.title: All Barbies should be made like this one.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I don't know why ALL barbies are not just made like this bc the flexibility is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: JenNoel

customer_reviews.title: Made Well
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie is made well and I love that you can put her in different poses. She comes in a cute outfit that looks like something one might wear for exercise or going out.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Made to Move rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the new 'made to move' Barbie dolls! They are not yet available in South Africa, so I bought the whole set. They seem to be quite sturdy and I don't think the joints will easily break. I'd say that these are perfect for an 'older' Barbie player, but definitely not as an entry level, first time Barbie.
customer_reviews.author: LZfromSA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good gift
customer_reviews.text: The joints were easily movable except for one of the elbows. Took a little work to get it To work. It’s what my granddaughter wanted and she likes it because she can make it hold dogs and babies.
customer_reviews.author: Usually Ecstatic

customer_reviews.title: Her head is very large for Barbie.
customer_reviews.text: She has a huge head as barbies go. Her hair is cut in a fairly short uneven layered cut too. The box was completely smashed. However she is very well articulated. Great for a child to play with for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: MelM

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll
customer_reviews.text: Great doll. Really love the articulation of the joints. Heads were easy to switch like with regular dolls. Hope they expand this line in the future or bring back old models. The purple ones (asian) are so rare their prices are 6 folds higher than original retail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... made to move barbies a week apart but was disappointed to find they had different clothing material the newer ...
customer_reviews.text: i had bought two made to move barbies a week apart but was disappointed to find they had different clothing material the newer one has a thicker material that you can easily see threw. however the newer is better quality 1 because the ankles are less floppy 2 the seems are tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina C.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present, everything seem to be in good and working condition. My niece was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GJ™️

customer_reviews.title: Host connection
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is my host Barbie I can not put here I’m water and she is my number three the main one.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Brian Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Great barbie
customer_reviews.text: If you like your Barbies to wrap their arms around Ken so he can carry her, this is your Barbie. She moves everywhich way and her yoga poses are perfect. Haha. Five year old Granddaughter LOVED them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Burcar

customer_reviews.title: Fun Barbie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Pilates instructor. She loved it! She may even let her daughters play with it. Ha.
customer_reviews.author: MomX5

customer_reviews.title: Great for making Barbies life more active
customer_reviews.text: Easily posable Barbie. Cute to make her do “yoga” . The feet rotate all the way around so smaller children may need to “straighten” them out after a few awhile.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, it came un-smashes and arrived on time. The person that received this was happy.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.text: Great articulation and hold a pose, but right out of the packaging she was a little stiff but the joints have loosen up over time. Her haircut is also a bit jagged but I just used the body so I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Jr Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Very Bendable
customer_reviews.text: Grand Daughter loves the doll She has it wrapped around a lamp post on her desk. She says the doll reminds her of her gymnastic and dance classes. I would have given it a 5 if it came with one more outfit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Barbie this Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received over ten Barbies this Christmas but this one was the best. Her Barbie can do exercise when her Mommy is working out. Both her Mommy and my Granddaughter love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect FLEXIBLE Barbie
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great barbie ! My daughter loves gymnastics so this is the perfect doll - its flexible and you can move it around and its very durable . This is the type of doll for every girl !
customer_reviews.author: Mommy5

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: My gymnastic granddaughter LOVES having a couple of Barbies that have flexible ankles, wrists, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for play
customer_reviews.text: Loved by girls. They love the movable arms and legs, continue this line for more diversity.
customer_reviews.author: WonderZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good body design, but the doll still has the uneven thin hair that has plagued recent Mattel dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is very posable and nicely made, plus is $5.00 cheeper than Wal-Mart
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: A treasured gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really, really wanted a made to barbie for Christmas last year. This is seriously the most played with doll that she has. It's great quality and very flexible. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Really posable better for older child, but great doll
customer_reviews.text: I love this doll, she is so adorable. I am a grown up and just wanted to have one to play with my daughter, so loves it too and took it from me lol.
customer_reviews.author: COagles

customer_reviews.title: Ok toy, shipping terrible
customer_reviews.text: There was no support around the package inside the bubble mailer. The box arrived dented in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love her!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you ladies, but I would have flipped my s#!t for this doll when I was a girl! Totally flexible joints and a yoga outfit! A yoga mat would have been 100%
customer_reviews.author: Loock

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for a Barbie Toy
customer_reviews.text: These are very fun to pose. Can do so much more in play. Wears normal Barbie clothes.
customer_reviews.author: CH in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: A little girl favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter. It's cute and easy to use doll. The moveable joints makes it easier to dress her and put her in cute poses. Granddaughter loves her.
customer_reviews.author: Linae

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loved her and the movement’s are wonderful she plays with her all the time.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great doll if you like to swap your Barbie's heads!
customer_reviews.text: Great doll if you like to swap your Barbie's heads! She is super flexible and I swap her head with others so I can do pictures with them! The outfit is kinda dull (but it is a yoga outfit, not meant to be flashy) and I wish it came with sneakers but oh well. Overall worth the price. <3
customer_reviews.author: Akaijaha Phills

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Barbie posing doll.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered the yoga Barbie. It arrived but not in the pose it was advertised. It’s still a Barbie that is poseable but it not the one that I chose. Being I was going for a yoga theme gift for the family, it was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love it. This is her favorite Barbie doll now!
customer_reviews.author: Zdenka

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for great niece
customer_reviews.text: Bought for great niece, who regularly exercises with her mom and grandma. She loves how flexible this doll is, allowing her to mimic the workout moves she also does.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Stellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Very flexible and easy to pose. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kara J Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Made to move is genius
customer_reviews.text: This is the best designed articulation ever made! Will always buy and keep in stock. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T.

customer_reviews.title: Never Came.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for my daughter for Christmas last year, and it never showed. The only upside to this was that I received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Coon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this doll! The only downfall was that the shoes came off very easily and she had lost them while we were out shopping. Other than that, great doll!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great Barbie for yoga loving girls. So many possible poses !
customer_reviews.author: Abbies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Barbie because you can poise her. She can also wear heels and flats. She is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: GinnGinnK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Everything we expected it to be it was. Barbie can be moved a lot more than all the other normal barbies. The daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flexibility and the face but the hair came uneven
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. • It exceeded my expectations ! • Fast delivery. • 100% recommendable Seller !! Thank you very much !!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla M

customer_reviews.title: Favorite doll
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite doll. Beautiful face, tons of poses, cute clothes, great price. She's a little smaller than a regular Barbie so the cheap outfits on Amazon fit her perfectly. I can't wait to get the other Made to Move dolls. Wish they made a guy doll!
customer_reviews.author: Betzy C

customer_reviews.title: I like this doll
customer_reviews.text: She's a cool doll and little girl I gifted to really likes her so I am pleased too!
customer_reviews.author: Earlybird shopper

customer_reviews.title: So many joints
customer_reviews.text: Where were barbies like this when I was a kid! Literally can be put into any position! Pretty neat!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Yeubanks

customer_reviews.title: Totally would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: There were many poses she was excited it put a smile on her face.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Orris

customer_reviews.title: BEST BARBIE
customer_reviews.text: All Barbie should be made to move. Able to do so much more! Daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good acting figure. Works well. Can pose the doll. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade to the Barbie collection
customer_reviews.text: Who thought my daughters could love playing with Barbies more than they already do! Then I bought "made to move" Barbies and these took their enjoyment to a whole new level!! They love these dolls. They've gone through a variety of yoga and gymnastics moves...and have not broken at the joints!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Giordano

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what’s on picture, items were gifts to my nieces, whom loved barbie being able to move many ways. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: This Barbie doll is by far the best doll Barbie has produced in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie doll is by far the best doll Barbie has produced in a long time. It's easy to position the doll in many fun poses, and the joints are nice a tight so it holds all poses well. My child isn't a "doll" lover, but she will pick up and play with this Barbie for hours on end. Great buy, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Galvan

customer_reviews.title: I love Barbie! mthis line of doll is perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Barbie!mthis line of doll is perfect for Barbie fans Of all ages, she's perfect, you can pose her in ways that We can think of, this doll line would make all vintage doll Lovers jealous, she is the perfect doll,all the dolls in this line Are a Barbie Fan's dream come true, thank you Mattel, As an adult Barbie fan. I enjoy moving her and posing her, This tilt is the mother f all jointed Barbie Doll lines!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a child that our church was giving to; don't know if she liked it or not but suspect she did
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Very movable.  Regular sized.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in all regular old barbie clothes. 7 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same doll as the picture ?!
customer_reviews.text: The doll I received was vary cheaply made, she barely had any hair on her (to the point where could see bold spots on her head) and the clothes were also vary cheaply made, and was vary different from the doll in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved this.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves bendy dolls and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Love my labs

customer_reviews.title: I think I can speak for the majority of the Barbie collecting community when I say that we have been waiting years for Mattel to
customer_reviews.text: As a Barbie enthusiast, collector, and sometimes photographer, I think I can speak for the majority of the Barbie collecting community when I say that we have been waiting years for Mattel to release an amazing articulated body for Barbie. The price is so on point, especially considering that the doll has 22 points of articulation which opens up the opportunity for photographers out there to experiment further with their doll photography. The body is excellently built, sturdy, and feels like it can handle a good amount of play wear for the younger consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Oneof88

customer_reviews.title: The price is very high and shipping is also very high
customer_reviews.text: The price is very high and shipping is also very high
customer_reviews.author: ameerh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is just getting in to Barbies and she loves it! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dorr

customer_reviews.title: Had to have this doll
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect on top of our daughters 21st bday cake! Completely poseable
customer_reviews.author: S.Traub

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite Barbie.
customer_reviews.text: The best Barbie doll hands down. They should have always made Barbie to move, it makes play time so much more fun. Moveable Barbie is able to hold babies and that alone makes her my daughter’s favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Downs

customer_reviews.title: Can make almost any human pose
customer_reviews.text: I can set this Barbie to performing a kneeling prayer or doing a real push up.
customer_reviews.author: vision

customer_reviews.title: Pretty movable Barbie!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Barbie, got it in pink color and it moves great
customer_reviews.author: NPR

customer_reviews.title: For a 7 yr old who loves Barbie
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my aspiring gymnast grandaughter to add to her Barbie collection. She loved it and that's most of the rating. The rest was the packaging and on time delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sales & Marketing Executive

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like how flexible this barbie , which makes it less chance to break when handled by a 4 yr old

customer_reviews.text: The doll looked ok, really moving flexibly, the hair of a poor quality, and eyes paint as well, like not original.

customer_reviews.title: Really bad hair
customer_reviews.text: The Barbie doll, the blonde, is OK, but the hair is so bad and completely unmanageable. Also the face is not that pretty as on the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Barbie is a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Shes easy to dress and move around so fitting closes on her is easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

product_meta.title: Barbie Made to Move Barbie Doll, Pink Top
product_meta.description: Barbie is always on the move, and now she can move in more ways than ever before! With Barbie Made to Move dolls, you can do anything. The storytelling fun is endless when Barbie doll can do things just like you! Capture lifelike movement with the ability to move and pose in ways that mimic realistic action. From riding a bicycle and playing a guitar to doing gymnastic bends and sitting cross-legged to owning a runway or taking selfies, Barbie doll’s realistic moves -guided by you -can do it all! Each doll has 22 “joints” -in the neck, upper arms, elbows, wrists, torso, hips, upper legs, knees AND ankles -for lots of flexibility and an incredible range of movement! Always fashionable, Barbie Made to Move doll wears a sleek modern outfit with black leggings and a colorful top to highlight her dynamic posability. The storytelling possibilities -and the imaginative moves -are limitless! Includes Barbie doll wearing fashions. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: With Barbie Made to Move doll, you can do anything!

Capture the action with the ability to move and pose in ways -- guided by you -- that mimic realistic action -- from riding a bicycle and playing a guitar to doing gymnastic bends and sitting cross-legged to owning a runway or taking selfies!
Barbie Made to Move dolls have 22 “joints” -- in the neck, upper arms, elbows, wrists, torso, hips, upper legs, knees AND ankles -- for an incredible range of motion!
Sleek modern fashions are perfect for on-the-move fun.
